name: Мастер-класс «»
descripnion: Graceful Contouring is a great workshop that will help you learn how to use stained glass contouring as well as learn more about stained glass painting in general.
descFeatures1: theoretical points under consideration: types of stained-glass windows, the concept of stained-glass painting, rules for drawing a contour;
descFeatures2: practical component of mk: preparation of the work surface, drawing the contour, adjusting the application, designing the work.
costMk: The cost of the master class includes:
descCostMk4: finished work that you take with you.

name: Master class «Stained glass postcard»
descripnion: Within the framework of this master class, you will be able to master the basics of using the contour - the basic material for painting, and also learn how to apply stained glass paints on a varnish basis.
descFeatures1: theoretical points under consideration: types of stained-glass windows, the concept of stained-glass painting, rules for drawing a contour, stained-glass paints;
descFeatures2: practical component of MK: preparation of the working surface, drawing the contour, adjusting its application, filling the contour drawing with stained glass paint, decorating the work.
costMk: The cost of the master class includes:
descCostMk4: finished work that you take with you.

name: Master class «Golden leaf»
descripnion: At this meeting, you will learn how to decorate a glass plate with gold leaf. And also show your imagination and create a product in truth with a unique palette of gold leaf. There is no limit to your imagination !!
descFeatures1: theoretical points under consideration: types of stained-glass windows, the concept of stained-glass painting, rules for applying water-based paint and potals;
descFeatures2: practical component of mk: preparation of the work surface, application of water-based paint, application of glue and glue, application of a protective layer.
costMk: The cost of the master class includes:
descCostMk4: finished work that you take with you.

name: Master class «На лужайке»
descripnion: I bring to your attention a master class, at the end of which you will have the skill of working with stained glass paints, ink and gold leaf.
costMk: The cost of the master class includes:

name: Master class «Murano»
descripnion: I invite you to plunge into the fascinating world of Venetian painting! Attending the «Murano» master class you can escape from the daily hustle and bustle and create a truly unique work by choosing the desired palette of colors. This picture is suitable for decorating a photo frame, as well as for decorating a table mirror - specify the desired option when adding participants to the group of the event.
descFeatures1: theoretical points under consideration: types of stained-glass windows, the concept of stained-glass painting, rules for drawing a contour, stained-glass paints;
descFeatures2: practical component of MK: preparation of the working surface, drawing the contour, adjusting its application, filling the contour drawing with acrylic stained glass paint, decorating the work.
costMk: The cost of the master class includes:

name: Master class «Fairy lamp»
descripnion: Within the framework of this master class, you will be able to master the technique of applying a contour, acquire basic skills in working with a structured paste, and also learn how to apply stained glass paints on a varnish basis. During the lesson, we will paint 4 glass walls of the lamp, which will help to strengthen the new knowledge and skills.
descFeatures1: theoretical points under consideration: types of stained-glass windows, the concept of stained-glass painting, rules for drawing a contour, stained-glass paints, structural paste;
descFeatures2: practical component of mk: preparation of the working surface, applying the contour, adjusting its application, applying a structural paste, filling the contour drawing with stained glass paint, decorating the work.
costMk: The cost of the master class includes:
descCostMk4: finished work that you take with you.

name: Master class «Tenderness»
descripnion: In this meeting, I will tell you the intricacies and intricacies of using the stained glass watercolor technique.
costMk: The cost of the master class includes:
descCostMk4: finished work that you take with you.

name: Master class «At dawn»
descripnion: Who has not yet had time to attend the meeting and master a new technique of stained glass painting? I propose to join me for a master class where I will tell and show non-contour and watercolor techniques. Thanks to a combination of several techniques, properties of glass and paints, your work will become a bright and original gift for yourself or loved ones!
costMk: The cost of the master class includes:
descCostMk3: consumables, materials for glass painting and frame decoration;
descCostMk4: finished work that you take with you.
